name: Thanatos Rises (Narrow Pathway)
description:
TWINE GAME

**Game is prone to glitches and cropped out notification windows on-browser, it is most compatible with the Twine 'test-play' action during this stage**

The premise behind the sci-fi, horror, rpg interactive fiction game revolves around four crew members aboard a Junker-class scavenger spaceship. With only one playable character with a limited narrow pathway design, the story tries to emphasise a choices-matter narrative design while also drawing players attention to multimodal style gaming. Incorporating, sound to further deepen the atmospherics and the use of imagery and font animations to enhance imersivity, Thanatos Rises tries to blend the jarring, disturbing writting techniques of horror fiction with the cold, logical accuracy of as close to non-speudo-science a sci-fi game has room to accomodate for.
